channel.title: Messages :: YWallet
channel.description: Messages With transactions, you can have memos or messages. Messages are your transaction memos shown in a more friendly way. Like transactions, they can be organized as a list or as a table. List Table If you have a contact in your address book with the matching address, Ywallet will display the contact name instead of the address. Also, the list shows your message as a chat. However, some of the messages may not have a known sender.

item.title: Message Details
item.description: Navigate to the previous/next message and to the previous/next message in the same thread. Threads are messages that share the same subject. Go to the transaction that contains the message.
